CustomField.formula: if ( OR( INCLUDES(Constituent_Types__c, "Board Member") , INCLUDES(Constituent_Types__c, "Bequest Giver"), INCLUDES(Constituent_Types__c, "Philanthropy"), INCLUDES(Constituent_Types__c, "Foundation - Private" ), INCLUDES(Constituent_Types__c, "Ambassadors"), Owner.UserRole.Name = "CEO"), True,false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This records constituent types indicate it's under active account management.
CustomField.label: Under Relationship Management
